entries.title: Bloober on Silent Hill 2 remake: 'We want to stick close to the original'
entries.description: The studio takes pains to reassure fans it will be faithful to Silent Hill 2's story.

entries.title: 2022 was the year the dam broke on major videogame unions
entries.description: A Call of Duty dev's strike at the end of 2021 snowballed into a series of studio unionizations.

entries.title: 7 times potentially awesome content was cut from a game during development
entries.description: The cutting room floor of the games industry is littered with half-designed characters, sidequests, and X-Wings.

entries.title: HTC finally shows its Meta Quest 2 rival wireless VR headset
entries.description: The HTC Vive XR Elite is due next month for a whopping $1099.

entries.title: Overwatch 2 introduces chaotic new deathmatch mode and equally chaotic bugs
entries.description: A Junker Queen bug unintentionally turns her into Reinhardt.

entries.title: Cyberpunk 2077 players furious at other Cyberpunk 2077 players for awarding it Steam's 2022 Labor of Love
entries.description: Not everyone thinks CD Projekt's cyber-RPG deserved the win, and they're saying so in the reviews.

entries.title: Game companies post absurdly broad salary ranges to 'comply' with new pay transparency laws
entries.description: Salary ranges as broad as $100,000 don't really live up to the transparency these new laws are meant to foster.

entries.title: Sim Wong Hoo, founder of Sound Blaster maker Creative Labs, has died
entries.description: Sim founded the company in 1981 and had remained at its head ever since.

entries.title: Dude who founded AGDQ in his mom's basement 13 years ago is moving on after raising $41 million for charity
entries.description: Awesome job done quick.

entries.title: Razer min-maxes its RTX 40-series gaming laptop lineup
entries.description: There's a whopping 18-inch Razer Blade coming at one end, while the next-gen Blade 16 somehow fits into a teeny tiny chassis.

entries.title: Sony's prototype car could be the start of a gross advertising trend
entries.description: The Afeela’s secret weapon might not be PS5 games on the go but actually running ads on the outside of your car.

entries.title: How to find Guardian Shields and block shots in Fortnite
entries.description: Block bullets for the week five quest.

entries.title: AMD just put a whole Zen 4 CPU inside an absolutely massive GPU
entries.description: Chiplets are so frickin' cool.

entries.title: Warzone 2 helicopters are randomly exploding
entries.description: We've had flying boats, time for falling choppers.

entries.title: Powered by K-pop, an Among Us-like has smashed Among Us' concurrent players record
entries.description: Goose Goose Duck walks, talks, and quacks like 2020's hottest social deduction game, but players are flocking to it like, well, you know.

entries.title: AMD's new Ryzen 7040 Series laptop APU has special AI sauce
entries.description: AMD beats Intel to putting a dedicated AI Engine into a consumer CPU.

entries.title: AMD crams 16 Zen 4 cores into gaming laptops with the Ryzen 7045 Series
entries.description: Zen 4 blazing away with all 16 cores... in a laptop.

entries.title: Noctua delays new 140mm fans by nearly a year due to 'strict quality standards'
entries.description: I hope you weren't waiting on these fans to finish your PC build.

entries.title: Destiny 2 Dark Decider: God roll and how to get it
entries.description: A Voltshot auto rifle you say?

entries.title: AMD RDNA 3 heads to gaming laptops with cheaper GPUs first to arrive
entries.description: AMD's Radeon RX 7600M XT brings RDNA 3 into gaming laptops. Here's what we know.

entries.title: AMD's new 3D V-Cache CPUs are hella quick but there's no clear pick for gamers
entries.description: For the highest clock speeds you're going to have to spend big on the Ryzen 9 7950X3D.

entries.title: 'We win… and it's your fault!'—Dwarf Fortress hits almost half a million sold in under a month
entries.description: Dwarf Fortress struck the Earth and found gold.

entries.title: Where to buy an Nvidia RTX 4070 Ti today: early retailer listings from $840–$1,050
entries.description: Nvidia's RTX 4070 Ti goes on sale today. Here are all the listings we've found so far.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 565 answer and hint for Thursday, January 5
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #565 puzzle.

entries.title: Sony shows off Project Leonardo, its accessibility controller
entries.description: Truly a hero in a half shell.

entries.title: This haunted typewriter is ironically the least creepy use for AI we've seen lately
entries.description: The crew from Mystery Inc. pull off the mask to reveal Arduino and AI.

entries.title: Strategy-RPGs to look forward to in 2023
entries.description: 2022 was a strong year for SRPGs on PC, and 2023 looks even better.

entries.title: Vampire Survivors studio says it couldn't find a 'non-predatory' mobile developer, so it did the job itself
entries.description: Poncle says it's doing its best with the mobile version of Vampire Survivors, but the studio is struggling on a few fronts.
